Piratini, October 18, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir,

I acknowledge the receipt of your letter dated the 17th of the current month, and I am informed of its content. I request Your Lordship Joaquim Pereira Fagundes, General Chief of Police of this Department, to facilitate the payment for goods recently purchased for the army.

God keep Your Lordship,
